summary: An unspeakable evil has come into our dimension and wants to rule over Earth, and only a mysterious sorceror known as Doctor Mordrid can stop him.
cast: Jeffrey Combs|Yvette Nipar|Jay Acovone|Keith Coulouris|Ritch Brinkley|Brian Thompson|Pearl Shear|Murray Rubin|Jeff Austin|John Apicella|Julie Michaels|Mark Phelan|Kenn Scott|Scott Roberts|Steven Marca|Jonathan Kruger|Alex Band|Debra Dion|Ray Etheridge
keywords: astral projection|satanism|murder of a nude woman|neo screwball comedy|doctor
title: Doctor Mordrid
